questions.question: Choose the correct option for given two statements. $ \\ \text{1. BEC can flip bit value. }\\ \text{2. BSC can erase bit value.}$

explanations.a: This option is true. With respect to statement $1$ observe that the Binary Erasure Channel (BEC) erases the transmitted symbol with some probability but cannot flip the bit value.
